A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: First 2 times i saw this\, i felt enjoyment in all the flashy cool things.. but after that 3rd time i tried to focus to story and flow of the film\, how its written\, how this works as a movie... it doesnt. its almost unwatchable because of plot holes and nonsensical cuts and story\, nothing is taken seriously\, Rey can do everything without effort\, perfection with everything she does... no faults\, no passions\, no character... all male characters are just jokes\, Hux is slapstick general\, Kylo Ren is back to emokid\, Luke is a hermit\, that im ok with\, but give us something to understand why\, something more than just few seconds of... whops didnt mean to do that... Noooo... \n\nwhole thing is starting to feel like a huge Trollfest....
